```{r, warning=F, message=F}
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
```


```{r}
dataframe <- read.delim("czas20.csv")

dataframe <- sapply(1:nrow(dataframe), function(i){
    dataframe[i, 1] <- gsub(",,", "", dataframe[i, 1])
  })
date <- sapply(2:length(dataframe), function(i){
  dataframe[i] |> substring(1, 12)
})
value <- sapply(2:length(dataframe), function(i){
  dataframe[i] |> substring(14, 16)
})

dataframe <- tibble::tibble(`Bielany - pwr` = date,
                            `czas` = value) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(`czas` = as.numeric(czas)) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(`czas` = czas)

dataframe
```
